0.0.000.name: Usable app
0.0.000.logs: -App is now usable, with basic functionality -Themes window -Settings window -Editor window -Full compatibility with old reload

0.0.100.name: slight optimizations
0.0.100.logs: -more themes added -better tool tip -theme item have their theme engraved to the it -cmd+E to open the editor window -font renderer now renders the font weight of 900 -new inputs, like n for next track, v for previous track and others -now possible to add params to the inputs -cover ins't fetched every time it reloads, now only the tracks are fetched every time, but now the algorithem uses map insted of 2 for loops -Added verions logs

0.0.200.name: Change logs and fonts
0.0.200.logs: -Added dates to change logs -Possible to change fonts in any theme. The fonts are from the user's computer or Rubik, that comes installed -Overlay blur animates on creation instead of being immediately visible (easear on the eyes, at least for me) -Visible change logs to user -Possible to change the library paths, where the tracks are fetched from

0.0.201.name: Bug fixes
0.0.201.logs: -Made the volume from settings not just change the slider in the main window, but also the volume of the audio source -When creating a new theme, the sidebar scrolls to the new theme

0.0.202.name: Themes changes
0.0.202.logs: -Album color now mixes with the background color and not with a clamp and checking if the theme is white, now it looks better in themes that the bg ins't a neutral color and light themes. -When another reload window is opened, the audio muffles and unmuffles when all external reload windows are closed -Added sfx to all external reload windows -Seperated the light themes from dark themes in theme editor for easers selection. -Added names to versions (the 'Themes changes' at the top)

0.0.300.name: Changable CSS
0.0.300.logs: -Random bug fixes that I forgor ðŸ’€ -911 happened 24 years ago -Ability to add custom CSS to all windows (ctrl or cmd + l to see the CSS window that allows you to see the CSS) -Changes to how music editor items is displayed -Added color blend for each theme, making it possible to change the amount of color mixing happening as described on 0.0.102 -Simplified the colorscheme, from 20vars to 14vars

0.0.400.name: Keyboard controls
0.0.400.logs: -bug fixes -controller and only keyboard controls fully compatible with the main reload window and some compatibility with other reload windows, for controller -can move cursor with a controller -Added controller settings to settings in the settings window (settings) -full compatibility with media session -Added default user data for looks and shortcuts -Removed scrollbars and consolidate shared CSS -Improved active state styling and modal backdrop

0.0.500.name: keyboards controls settings
0.0.500.logs: -Can add and remove shortcuts in settings -Able to change, add and remove keybindings in the settings, and not by editing the JSON file manually -Fixed some math problems when moving down on a grid with keys, now it should have the same properties as up -fixed some css problems in themes -Fixed the light or dark theme btns not change the active state when expected

0.1.000.name: This was meant to just be a algorithm update ðŸ—¿
